info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 03 at 4:31PM CDT until August 03 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN GREENE AND NORTHEASTERN JERSEY COUNTIES... At 431 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Jerseyville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Law enforcement. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Jerseyville, Kemper, Old Kane, Kane, Rockbridge, Fidelity and Delhi. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
